definition: ligament made of metal and used to fasten things or make cages or fences etc, equip for use with electricity
details:
noun
- ligament made of metal and used to fasten things or make cages or fences etc
- a metal conductor that carries electricity over a distance
= synonyms: conducting wire
- a message transmitted by telegraph
= synonyms: telegram
- the finishing line on a racetrack
verb
- equip for use with electricity
= synonyms: electrify
- send cables, wires, or telegrams
= synonyms: cable
- fasten with wire
= example: fasten with wire
- string on a wire
= example: string on a wire
- provide with electrical circuits
= example: provide with electrical circuits
